medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Samurai, Boatman, Lion Dance, Southern Islander
description: rear 3/4 view of human figure; checkered skirt with wave motif at bottom; billowing short coat with circular crests; two samurai swords crossed under coat; head fully covered with woven hat; wood grain background in rust color
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
